name: Wizard Staff [unfinished fragment]
description:
HERE BE DRAGONS: This is a game that was never meant to be released in this state. As such, the quality may be subpar and the game might be full of bugs. It might even randomly crash.

A game submitted to the Fragment Jam. This was the first project I created with Unity back in 2011. You control a wizard in some kind of wooden dungeon. Pick up the staff and explore the area.

Controls: 

WASD: Move around
Left Click / CTRL (recommended):  Shoot fire (if holding staff)
E: Use / Interact
Space: Jump
